summary: Explores the concept of ecosystem architecture, emphasizing decentralized and non-hierarchical structures in various domains like biology and the internet. This approach fosters innovative ecosystems through a balance of structure and creativity, integrating ideas from diverse fields to adapt to changes and build sustainable communities.
excerpt: Biological ecosystems are defined by space and time, but modern ecosystems transcend these. Ecosystem architecture proposes decentralized, non-hierarchical structures inspired by diverse disciplines.
